data.SOURCE:
@EndUserText.label: 'KDV2 - Düğüm'
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
define view entity ZTAX_DDL_I_VAT2_NODE 
as select from ztax_t_kdv2g
association to parent ZTAX_DDL_I_VAT2_SUBHEAD as _SubHead on $projection.CompanyCode = _SubHead.CompanyCode
                                                         and $projection.Refrection1 = _SubHead.Refrection1
                                                         and $projection.Refrection2 = _SubHead.Refrection2
                                                         
association [1..1] to ZTAX_DDL_I_VAT2_COMPANY_CODES as _CompanyCodes on $projection.CompanyCode = _CompanyCodes.CompanyCode
                                                        
{
    key bukrs as CompanyCode,
    key kiril1 as Refrection1,
    key kiril2 as Refrection2,
    key mwskz as TaxCode,
    _SubHead,
    _CompanyCodes
    
}
